snippet: The release of clients’ names has stirred dread and division in the postcard-perfect coastal town of Kennebunk, Me.
abstract: Police in Kennebunk, Me, investigating reports that local Zumba instructor Alexis Wright was running a one-woman brothel out of her exercise studio have begun releasing names of her clients who have been charged with patronizing a prostitute; release has set the town buzzing because list is rumored to be replete with names of prominent people.
lead_paragraph: The release of clients’ names has stirred dread and division in the postcard-perfect coastal town of Kennebunk, Me.

headline.seo: Maine Town Abuzz Over Prostitution Inquiry and Client List
headline.main: A Town Abuzz Over Prostitution and a Client List
headline.print_headline: A Town Abuzz Over Prostitution And a Client List
